flowchart.name: Application Structure Flowchart
flowchart.description: This flowchart illustrates the hierarchical structure of the application, showing the main components and their relationships.

flowchart.name: Data Flow Flowchart
flowchart.description: This flowchart visualizes the flow of data within the application, showing how data is generated, processed, and passed between different components.

flowchart.name: Service Interaction Flowchart
flowchart.description: This flowchart focuses on the interaction between the different services in the application, outlining the steps involved in connecting to the respective services and passing data.

flowchart.name: User Interface Flowchart
flowchart.description: This flowchart depicts the user interface (UI) interactions in the application, illustrating the different screens, input boxes, and buttons.

flowchart.name: Testing Flowchart
flowchart.description: This flowchart outlines the testing process for the application, including the different test cases and their dependencies.

flowchart.name: Utility Functions Flowchart
flowchart.description: This flowchart focuses on the utility functions in the application, illustrating the different utility functions and their relationships.

flowchart.name: Deployment Flowchart
flowchart.description: This flowchart outlines the deployment process of the application, including building, packaging, and deploying to various environments.

sequence_diagram.name: User Interaction Sequence
sequence_diagram.description: Shows the sequence of interactions between the user interface (UI) and the application components.

sequence_diagram.name: Data Generation Sequence
sequence_diagram.description: Illustrates the flow of data generation and processing, including steps like retrieving data, applying data algorithms, and generating outputs.

sequence_diagram.name: Service Integration Sequence
sequence_diagram.description: Depicts the interaction between the application services and external APIs or libraries.

sequence_diagram.name: Configuration Sequence
sequence_diagram.description: Shows how the application loads and processes configuration settings.

sequence_diagram.name: Testing Sequence
sequence_diagram.description: Illustrates the sequence of steps involved in executing tests.

sequence_diagram.name: Logging Sequence
sequence_diagram.description: Depicts the flow of logging activities within the application.

sequence_diagram.name: File Handling Sequence
sequence_diagram.description: Shows the sequence of steps involved in file handling operations.

sequence_diagram.name: API Communication Sequence
sequence_diagram.description: Illustrates the sequence of API calls and responses between different microservices in the application architecture.

class_diagram.name: System Structure
class_diagram.description: This diagram illustrates the classes in the system, their attributes, methods, and the relationships among them.

class_diagram.name: User Interaction Classes
class_diagram.description: This diagram focuses on the classes related to user interactions, showing their attributes, methods, and how they interact with other parts of the system.

class_diagram.name: Service Integration Classes
class_diagram.description: This diagram illustrates the classes involved in integrating different services, including their methods and relationships with other classes.

class_diagram.name: Data Processing Classes
class_diagram.description: This diagram depicts the classes responsible for data processing, their attributes, methods, and how they interact with data storage and retrieval classes.

class_diagram.name: Utility Classes
class_diagram.description: This diagram outlines the utility classes within the system, showing their common methods and relationships.

state_diagram.name: User Interaction States
state_diagram.description: This diagram illustrates the states involved in user interaction, showing transitions between states based on user actions.

state_diagram.name: Data Processing States
state_diagram.description: This diagram depicts the states and transitions involved in data processing, including data retrieval, transformation, and storage.

state_diagram.name: Service Integration States
state_diagram.description: This diagram outlines the states related to integrating various services, such as connecting to external APIs, and the transitions between these states.

state_diagram.name: System Initialization States
state_diagram.description: This diagram shows the states involved in system initialization, including configuration loading, service startup, and readiness checks.

state_diagram.name: Error Handling States
state_diagram.description: This diagram focuses on the states related to error handling, illustrating how the system transitions between states in response to different error conditions.

entity_relationship_diagram.name: Customer Relations
entity_relationship_diagram.description: This diagram shows the CUSTOMER entity and its relationships with other entities such as ORDERS and PRODUCTS.

entity_relationship_diagram.name: Inventory Management
entity_relationship_diagram.description: This diagram represents the PRODUCT entity, its attributes, and its relationships with entities like SUPPLIERS and INVENTORY.

entity_relationship_diagram.name: Employee Management
entity_relationship_diagram.description: This diagram illustrates the EMPLOYEE entity, depicting its relationships with other entities such as DEPARTMENT and JOB ROLES.

entity_relationship_diagram.name: Billing and Payment
entity_relationship_diagram.description: This diagram focuses on the PAYMENT entity, showing its attributes and relationships with entities like CUSTOMER and INVOICES.

entity_relationship_diagram.name: Service Provision
entity_relationship_diagram.description: This diagram outlines the SERVICE entity and its relationships with other entities such as CUSTOMER and SERVICE PROVIDERS.

user_journey_diagram.name: Customer Checkout Journey
user_journey_diagram.description: This diagram illustrates the journey a customer takes to select products, add them to the cart, and complete the checkout process.

user_journey_diagram.name: User Registration Journey
user_journey_diagram.description: This diagram depicts the steps involved in a user registering for an account, including filling out details, email verification, and profile setup.

user_journey_diagram.name: Product Search and Filtering Journey
user_journey_diagram.description: This diagram outlines the journey users take to search for products, apply filters, and view product details.

user_journey_diagram.name: Customer Support Interaction Journey
user_journey_diagram.description: This diagram shows the journey of a customer seeking support, including navigating to the support page, selecting a support option, and interacting with support staff.

user_journey_diagram.name: User Content Creation Journey
user_journey_diagram.description: This diagram illustrates the steps a user takes to create and publish content within the platform, including drafting, editing, previewing, and publishing.

gantt_diagram.name: Project Development Timeline
gantt_diagram.description: This Gantt chart illustrates the development timeline for the project, including phases such as planning, development, testing, and deployment.

gantt_diagram.name: Feature Implementation Timeline
gantt_diagram.description: This Gantt chart focuses on the implementation timeline for specific features, showing the start and end dates and dependencies between tasks.

gantt_diagram.name: Maintenance Schedule
gantt_diagram.description: This Gantt chart outlines the schedule for regular maintenance tasks, including updates, bug fixes, and performance optimizations.

pie_chart.name: User Demographics
pie_chart.description: This pie chart represents the distribution of users across different age groups or regions.

pie_chart.name: Revenue Sources
pie_chart.description: This pie chart illustrates the proportion of revenue coming from different products or services.

pie_chart.name: System Resource Usage
pie_chart.description: This pie chart shows the allocation of system resources such as memory, CPU, and storage.

quadrant_chart.name: Product Priority
quadrant_chart.description: This quadrant chart plots products based on their market growth and market share, helping in decision-making for investment and development.

quadrant_chart.name: Risk Assessment
quadrant_chart.description: This quadrant chart is used to visualize risks, plotting them based on their potential impact and likelihood, aiding in risk management strategies.

quadrant_chart.name: Customer Segmentation
quadrant_chart.description: This quadrant chart represents customers based on their value and engagement, providing insights into customer relationships and marketing strategies.

requirement_diagram.name: Functional Requirements
requirement_diagram.description: This diagram visualizes the functional requirements of the system, showing connections and dependencies between various requirements.

requirement_diagram.name: Non-Functional Requirements
requirement_diagram.description: This diagram outlines the non-functional requirements, such as performance and security, and illustrates their relationships to other elements.

requirement_diagram.name: User Requirements
requirement_diagram.description: This diagram focuses on user-related requirements, illustrating how they connect to system functionalities and constraints.

gitgraph_diagram.name: Main Branching Strategy
gitgraph_diagram.description: This Git Graph represents the primary branching strategy, showing the commits and actions on various branches in the main development flow.

gitgraph_diagram.name: Feature Branching Strategy
gitgraph_diagram.description: This Git Graph visualizes the strategy for feature branches, depicting how features are developed and merged into the main codebase.

gitgraph_diagram.name: Hotfix Branching Strategy
gitgraph_diagram.description: This Git Graph illustrates the branching strategy for hotfixes, including the creation, development, and merging of hotfix branches.

c4_diagram.name: System Context
c4_diagram.description: This C4 diagram provides an overview of the entire system, showing how it fits into the larger environment.

c4_diagram.name: Container View
c4_diagram.description: This C4 diagram shows the high-level structure of the software, focusing on containers and their interactions.

c4_diagram.name: Component View
c4_diagram.description: This C4 diagram details the components within a container, illustrating how they interact with one another.

mindmap.name: Project Overview
mindmap.description: This mindmap organizes the key concepts, goals, and stakeholders for the project, showing their relationships.

mindmap.name: System Architecture
mindmap.description: This mindmap visually represents the architecture of the system, connecting major components, technologies, and dependencies.

timeline_diagram.name: Project Development Timeline
timeline_diagram.description: This timeline illustrates the key milestones and events in the project's development history.

timeline_diagram.name: System Lifecycle Timeline
timeline_diagram.description: This timeline depicts the various phases of the system's lifecycle, including design, development, deployment, maintenance, and decommissioning.

timeline_diagram.name: User Activity Timeline
timeline_diagram.description: This timeline shows the chronology of user activities and interactions with the system.

zenuml_sequence_diagram.name: User Registration ZenUML Sequence
zenuml_sequence_diagram.description: A ZenUML sequence diagram illustrating the process of user registration in the system.

zenuml_sequence_diagram.name: Data Processing ZenUML Sequence
zenuml_sequence_diagram.description: A ZenUML sequence diagram depicting the steps involved in data processing within the system.

flow_analysis_diagram.name: Code Execution Flow Analysis
flow_analysis_diagram.description: This diagram visually breaks down the execution flow of specific code segments, aiding in understanding code behavior and potential bottlenecks.

flow_analysis_diagram.name: Data Flow Analysis
flow_analysis_diagram.description: Illustrates the flow of data through your application's components, helping in identifying data sources, transformations, and sinks.
